name: Moving Countries: Canada Edition
description:
Created for RMIT Game a Week 11: Compendium

The final official jam for this semester!!! I have plans of going back and finishing the 2 weeks I skipped but woo! What a project this has been.

This collection features some of my most narratively similiar games from the semester, mushed together in a very frojo fashion. Thanks for coming along on the journey with me :) <3 

Controls

Left/Right click in most games.

Minigames have various controls.

Attributes in read me :)
